headline: Align Technology downgraded to Hold from Buy at Jefferies
summary: Jefferies downgraded Align Technology (ALGN) to Hold from Buy with a price target of $140, down from $215. The firm’s U.S. dental survey indicates “mixed-to-negative” on clear aligner penetration and continued share loss for Align. A survey of 49 orthodontists and general dentists revealed “only modest, and underwhelming,” incremental clear aligner penetration through 2030 and continued share loss for Align Technology, the analyst tells investors in a research note. headline: Is Align Technology’s Falling Share Price in 2025 an Opportunity After 43% Decline?
summary: Thinking about making a move on Align Technology stock? If you have been following the dental tech space, you know Align is no stranger to big price swings. Over the past year alone, the share price has tumbled by more than 43%. Zoom out to the five-year chart and it is clear the journey has been even bumpier, with losses stacking up to 62.6%. Even in the last month, Align shares have slipped another 5.4% as investors weigh up shifting market dynamics and await firmer growth signals. There...

headline: Does Weak Aligner Shipments and Rising Costs Change the Bull Case for Align Technology (ALGN)?
summary: Earlier this week, Align Technology reported disappointing clear aligner shipment volumes and elevated expenses that weighed on its profitability. This development signals operational challenges that are prompting investors to reassess growth prospects amid rising costs and demand volatility. We'll now examine how these operational setbacks, especially the shipment shortfalls, influence Align Technology's broader investment outlook. headline: What Recent Developments Could Shift the Narrative for Align Technology
summary: Align Technology’s consensus analyst price target has seen a modest decrease, moving from $186.36 to $180.29 per share. This shift reflects new insights from street research, balancing sector challenges with emerging growth opportunities for the company. Stay tuned to discover how investors and analysts can follow the evolving narrative around Align Technology's prospects. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent street research offers a complex and balanced picture for Align Technology...
